comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Willie Ritchie (born Gerhardt Anthony Steffen, February 13, 1891 – March 24, 1975), was the world lightweight boxing champion from 1912 to 1914. A repeat appearance, but this might be the best picture of him...

comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: it's amazing how many photos of celebrities are on the great liners.  We never see photos of modern celebrities on airplanes  :)

comment.author: 78412940@N08
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/29079609@N02] We see them in airports.

AFAIK, the photographers would ride small boats out to meet the incoming liners, shoot the incoming notables from a passenger list they had bribed a clerk for, and stay aboard until the last moment on a departing liner, leaving on a small boat.

Paparazzi of their day.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: trialsanderrors and Wystan: Thank you for the information on boxer Willie Ritchie and the date. lazygardens:  Thank you for describing how the photographers took these ocean liner pictures of celebrities which are so frequent in the Bain collection.
